question: in a corporation , 50 percent of the male employees and 40 percent of the female employees are at least 35 years old . if 42 percent of all the employees are at least 35 years old , what fraction of the employees in the corporation are females ?

the speed of a subway train is represented by the equation z = s ^ 2 + 2 s for all situations where 0 ≤ s ≤ 7 , where z is the rate of speed in kilometers per hour and s is the time in seconds from the moment the train starts moving . in kilometers per hour , how much faster is the subway train moving after 7 seconds than it was moving after 4 seconds ?
how many litres of pure acid are there in 8 litres of a 20 % solution
there is 60 % increase in an amount in 6 years at s . i . what will be the c . i . of rs . 12,000 after 3 years at the same rate ?
the length of a rectangular floor is more than its breadth by 200 % . if rs . 529 is required to paint the floor at the rate of rs . 3 / sq m , what would be the length of the floor ?
what is the dividend . divisor 19 , the quotient is 9 and the remainder is 5 ?

for each month of a given year except december , a worker earned the same monthly salary and donated one - tenth of that salary to charity . in december , the worker earned n times his usual monthly salary and donated one - fifth of his earnings to charity . if the worker ' s charitable contributions totaled one - sixth of his earnings for the entire year , what is the value of n ?
if [ x ] is the greatest integer less than or equal to x , what is the value of [ - 6.2 ] + [ - 3.4 ] + [ 12.7 ] ?

the number of people who purchased book a is twice the number of people who purchased book b . the number of people who purchased both books a and b is 500 , which is twice the number of people who purchased only book b . what is the number of people x who purchased only book a ?

a monkey ascends a greased pole 22 meters high . he ascends 2 meters in the first minute and then slips down 1 meter in the alternate minute . if this pattern continues until he climbs the pole , in how many minutes would he reach at the top of the pole ?
find the area of trapezium whose parallel sides are 18 cm and 12 cm long , and the distance between them is 14 cm ?
how many internal diagonals does a nonagon ( nine sided polygon ) have ?

at a certain restaurant , the ratio of the number of cooks to the number of waiters is 3 to 10 . when 12 more waiters are hired , the ratio of the number of cooks to the number of waiters changes to 3 to 14 . how many cooks does the restaurant have ?

for the past n days , the average ( arithmetic mean ) daily production at a company was 50 units . if today ' s production of 90 units raises the average to 58 units per day , what is the value of n ?

the volume of a rectangular swimming pool is 840 cubic meters and water is flowing into the swimming pool . if the surface level of the water is rising at the rate of 0.5 meters per minute , what is the rate s , in cubic meters per minutes , at which the water is flowing into the swimming pool ?
two unbiased coins are tossed . find the probability of getting two heads ?
a car travels at a speed of 75 miles per hour . how far will it travel in 5 hours ?

if the sides of a rectangle are increased by 15 % , what is the percentage increase in the area ?
i . x + 2 y + 3 z = 2 ii . x + y - z = 0 iii . 2 x + 2 y - z = 1 what is the value of y in the system above ?
a , b and c rents a pasture for rs . 950 . a put in 12 horses for 8 months , b 16 horses for 9 months and 18 horses for 6 months . how much should c pay ?
if n is a prime number greater than 3 , what is the remainder when n ^ 2 is divided by 13 ?
excluding stoppages , the speed of a bus is 82 kmph and including stoppages , it is 75 kmph . for how many minutes does the bus stop per hour ?

a squirrel runs up a cylindrical post , in a perfect spiral path making one circuit for each rise of 4 feet . how many feet does the squirrel travels if the post is 16 feet tall and 2 feet in circumference ?

on a scale that measures the intensity of a certain phenomenon , a reading of d + 1 corresponds to an intensity that is 10 times the intensity corresponding to a reading of d . on that scale , the intensity corresponding to a reading of 8 is how many times as great as the intensity corresponding to a reading of 3 ?
the average age of a group of 10 students is 14 years . if 5 more students join the group , the average age rises by 1 year . the average age of the new students is :
given that 268 x 74 = 19732 , find the value of 2.68 x . 74 .
a shopkeeper sold an article at $ 1050 and gained a 20 % profit . what was the cost price ?
if | 5 x - 5 | = 150 , what is the sum of all the possible values of x ?
in a class of 30 students in an examination in maths 3 students scored 95 marks each , 3 get zero each and the average of the rest was 45 . what is the average of the whole class ?

two goods trains each 500 m long are running in opposite directions on parallel tracks . their speeds are 60 km / hr and 30 km / hr respectively . find the time taken by the slower train to pass the driver of the faster one ?
how many factors of 30 are odd numbers greater than 1 ?

for any integer k greater than 1 , the symbol k * denotes the product of all integers between 1 and k , inclusive . if k * is a multiple of 3,675 , what is the least possible value of k ?

according to the directions on the can of frozen orange juice concentrate , 1 can of concentrate is to be mixed with 3 cans of water to make orange juice . how many 12 ounces cans of the concentrate are required to prepare 320 6 ounces servings of orange juice ?

a welder received an order to make a 1 million liter cube - shaped tank . if he has only 4 x 2 meter sheets of metal that can be cut , how many metal sheets will be required for this ordert ? ( 1 cubic meter = 1000 liters )
in a certain pet shop , the ratio of dogs to cats to bunnies in stock is 3 : 5 : 9 . if the shop carries 204 dogs and bunnies total in stock , how many dogs are there ?
